intro.name: Vuong Minh Truc
intro.description: I don't write program, I write my life

connect.title: About me
connect.text: Develop with passion for Problem Solving
connect.description: I am a student majoring in information technology, University of Transport, Ho Chi Minh City. I am a person who is eager to learn and discover new things. Currently, I am a front end developer with Javascript language. My future direction is to work with javascript libraries for frontend, backend as well as mobile.

email.title: What's next?
email.description: Thank you for taking the time to view my profile, if you see what I have that matches your requirements please contact me. Looking forward to the opportunity to work with you. Best regards!
